content:
Seems that there might be an issue with the language display expansion validation logic
http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-IZYW6T_repo_source_examples_verificationresult-example-license
Gives the error:

The display "English (United States)" is not a valid display for the code {urn:ietf:bcp:47}en-US - should be one of ["English (Region=United States)"]

And the log isn't showing the Region= in the displays available
(low priority issue)
make a task so I remember to get to it
